title: Purse, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, glass beads
Technique: looping incorporating strung beads. Two panels worked separately.
dimensions: H x W: 10.2 x 7.6 cm (4 x 3 in.)
creditline: Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper
description: Looped bag with solid beadwork. Design shows a woman with bouquet in pastoral setting, with "Jay La Victoire" above her head. On other side of bag, two cupids by a stream with illegible (damaged) inscription in French. Lined with pink silk damask, probably of later date.

tombstone.epitaph:
Purse, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk, glass beads
Technique: looping incorporating strung beads. Two panels worked separately.. Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper. 1957-180-17.
